title: Design for Textile
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
medium: Colored pencil, graphite on heavy white tracing paper
description: Diagonally striped "J" and "C" bracket like shapes closely grouped.  Some shapes at the top and bottom of the sheet are indicated by dotted lines in green colored pencil.
name: Drawing
